articles.description: Ricky Martin performed at The Hollywood Bowl after winning a court battle against his 21-year-old nephew who accused the award-winning singer of sexual abuse and of stalking.
articles.content:
Ricky Martin gave a celebratory performance alongside the L.A. Philharmonic Orchestra Friday night at the Hollywood Bowl. 
The Puerto Rican singer, 50, made his first public appearance after his rec… [+3674 chars]

articles.title: X Factor unseen clip finally reveals how Simon Cowell created One Direction - Daily Mail
articles.description: To celebrate the 12th birthday of One Direction being formed The X Factor have shared a close up video on how exactly the hit boyband were created on Twitter on Saturday.
articles.content:
Exactly 12 years ago One Direction were created by X Factor judges Simon Cowell, Louis Walsh and Nicole Scherzinger. 
And to celebrate the occasion, the former ITV show have shared an unseen video d… [+5061 chars]

articles.title: Andrew Lincoln and Danai Gurira announce a new Walking Dead spin-off during Comic-Con appearance - Daily Mail
articles.description: Andrew Lincoln and Danai Gurira will return for a The Walking Dead spin-off. The pair will reprise their roles as Rick and Michonne Grimes for the AMC+ series in 2023.
articles.content:

articles.description: ‘I can’t believe I’m firmly in the “ The Gray Man is good, actually” camp’
articles.content:
Netflix viewers are taking to Twitter to say actually The Gray Man is good despite what critics think.

articles.author: Andrew Webster
articles.title: John Wick 4's first trailer questions when it all ends - The Verge
articles.description: At San Diego Comic-Con 2022 fans got a first glimpse at John Wick 4 in a new trailer, which stars Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Donnie Yen, and Bill Skarsgård. It’s coming to theaters in March 2023.
